ovdesc.p: This is a live file holding the SY.EVENT error details.

desc.p: The actual (server) date on which this error occurred. Note that this may not be the same as SYSTEM.DATE.
The time at which this error occurred.
Not used as this is a live file.
Not used as this is a live file.
If the field MAINT.MSG.DETS is set to 'Y' in the OFS.SOURCE record as specified in SY.PARAMETER, this field will show the originating error message from the underlying application.
Not used as this is a live file.
Not used as this is a live file.
The system (T24) date at the time the error was generated. Note that this may not be the same as DATE.
The last time this event ran successfully.
The key to the output (COMO) file generated for this agent and job.
This is the key to this SY.EVENT.ERRORS record.
The transaction key for this event.
The event definition key for this event.
The COB phase in which this event failed.
Not used as this is a live file.
Not used as this is a live file.
The event that has failed.

If the field MAINT.MSG.DETS is set to 'Y' in the OFS.SOURCE record as specified in SY.PARAMETER, this field will link to an OFS.REQUEST.DETAILS record showing the originating error message from the underlying application.
The agent number which was processing this event.
Not used as this is a live file.
Not used as this is a live file.
Not used as this is a live file.
